languages.text: {n}Вы слышали множество историй о подобных культах смерти. Священные убийцы {g|Encyclopedia:ImperiumGlossary}Империума{/g}, превратившие смерть в форму почитания Императора. Виртуозные убийцы, невидимые палачи и искусные каратели предателей, еретиков и падших душ. Многие праведные люди чтут их как святых подвижников, другие же находят их пугающие ритуалы слишком экзальтированными и затронутыми безумием.{/n}

{n}You have heard many stories about death cults such as this one. These devoted, holy assassins of the {g|Encyclopedia:ImperiumGlossary}Imperium{/g} have turned death into a form of worship of the Emperor. They are exemplary slayers, invisible executioners, and the scourge of traitors, heretics, and fallen souls. Many righteous people honour them as votaries of the faith, while others see their fearsome rituals as frenzied spectacles touched by madness.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вы слышали множество историй о подобных культах смерти. Священные убийцы {g|Encyclopedia:ImperiumGlossary}Империума{/g}, превратившие смерть в форму почитания Императора. Виртуозные убийцы, невидимые палачи и искусные каратели предателей, еретиков и падших душ. Многие праведные люди чтут их как святых подвижников, другие же находят их пугающие ритуалы слишком экзальтированными и затронутыми безумием.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}You have heard many stories about death cults such as this one. These devoted holy assassins of the {g|Encyclopedia:ImperiumGlossary}Imperium{/g} have turned death into a form of worship of the Emperor. They are exemplary slayers, invisible executioners, and the scourge of traitors, heretics, and fallen souls. Many righteous people honour them as votaries of the faith, while others see their fearsome rituals as frenzied spectacles touched with madness.{/n}

{n}One look is enough to make you realise who you're facing. Holy warriors of the Imperium who have made death, their own and others', their way of serving Him. Master assassins, unseen executioners, and skilful punishers of traitors, heretics, and fallen souls. Members of a death cult.{/n}

{n}You have heard many stories about death cults such as this one. These devoted, holy assassins of the {g|Encyclopedia:ImperiumGlossary}Imperium{/g} have turned death into a form of worship of the Emperor. They are exemplary slayers, invisible executioners, and the scourge of traitors, heretics, and fallen souls alike. Many righteous people honour them as votaries of the faith, while others see their fearsome rituals as frenzied spectacles touched by madness.{/n}

{n}You recognise these people immediately for what they are — death cultists. These holy warriors of the Imperium believe they serve the Emperor through death. They take the lives of others, and willingly sacrifice their own. They are master assassins, invisible executioners, and the scourge of traitors, heretics and fallen souls.{/n}

{n}You have heard many stories about death cults such as this one. These devoted, holy assassins of the {g|Encyclopedia:ImperiumGlossary}Imperium{/g} have turned death into a form of worship of the Emperor. They are exemplary slayers, invisible executioners, and the scourge of traitors, heretics, and fallen souls. Many righteous people honour them as votaries of the faith, while others see their fearsome rituals as frenzied spectacles touched by madness.{/n}

They are exemplary slayers, invisible executioners, and the scourge of traitors, heretics, and fallen souls alike. Many righteous people honour them as votaries of the faith, while others see their fearsome rituals as frenzied spectacles touched by madness.{/n}

{n}You have heard many stories about death cults such as this one. These devoted, holy assassins of the {g|Encyclopedia:ImperiumGlossary}Imperium{/g} have turned death into a form of worship of the Emperor. They are exemplary slayers, invisible executioners, and the scourge of traitors, heretics, and fallen souls. Many righteous people honour them as votaries of the faith, while others see their fearsome rituals as frenzied spectacles touched by madness.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vous avez entendu des tas d'histoires au sujet de sectes comme celle-ci. Ces assassins sacrés dévoués à l'{g|Encyclopedia:ImperiumGlossary}Imperium{/g} ont érigé la mort au rang de culte rendu à l'Empereur. Tueurs hors pair, bourreaux invisibles et fléaux des traîtres, des hérétiques et des âmes déchues. Bon nombre de fidèles croyants les considèrent comme des saints, quand d'autres voient dans leurs rituels effroyables une manifestation délirante de leur démence.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You have heard many stories about death cults such as this one. These devoted, holy assassins of the {g|Encyclopedia:ImperiumGlossary}Imperium{/g} have turned death into a form of worship of the Emperor. They are exemplary slayers, invisible executioners, and the scourge of traitors, heretics, and fallen souls. Many righteous people honour them as votaries of the faith, while others see their fearsome rituals as frenzied spectacles touched by madness.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous avez entendu des tas d'histoires au sujet de sectes comme celle-ci. Ces assassins sacrés dévoués à l'{g|Encyclopedia:ImperiumGlossary}Imperium{/g} ont érigé la mort au rang de culte rendu à l'Empereur. Tueurs hors pair, bourreaux invisibles et fléaux des traîtres, des hérétiques et des âmes déchues. Bon nombre de fidèles croyants les considèrent comme des saints, quand d'autres voient dans leurs rituels effroyables une manifestation délirante de leur démence.{/n}

{n}Vous reconnaissez immédiatement ces gens : ce sont des cultistes de la mort, des guerriers sacrés de l'Imperium qui croient servir l'Empereur en répandant la mort. Ils prennent la vie des autres sans pour autant hésiter à sacrifier la leur. Maîtres assassins, bourreaux invisibles et fléaux des traîtres, des hérétiques et des âmes déchues.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Has oído muchas historias sobre Cultos de la Muerte como este. Estos asesinos sagrados y devotos del {g|Encyclopedia:ImperiumGlossary}Imperium{/g} han convertido al muerte en una forma de adoración del Emperador. Son verdugos ejemplares, ejecutores invisibles y la perdición de los traidores, herejes y almas perdidas. Muchos piadosos los honran como campeones de la fe, mientras que otros consideran sus espantosos rituales espectáculos salvajes teñidos de locura.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You have heard many stories about death cults such as this one. These devoted, holy assassins of the {g|Encyclopedia:ImperiumGlossary}Imperium{/g} have turned death into a form of worship of the Emperor. They are exemplary slayers, invisible executioners, and the scourge of traitors, heretics, and fallen souls. Many righteous people honour them as votaries of the faith, while others see their fearsome rituals as frenzied spectacles touched by madness.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Has oído muchas historias sobre Cultos de la Muerte como este. Estos asesinos sagrados y devotos del {g|Encyclopedia:ImperiumGlossary}Imperium{/g} han convertido al muerte en una forma de adoración del Emperador. Son verdugos ejemplares, ejecutores invisibles y la perdición de los traidores, herejes y almas perdidas. Muchos piadosos los honran como campeones de la fe, mientras que otros consideran sus espantosos rituales espectáculos salvajes teñidos de locura.{/n}

{n}Reconoces de inmediato a estas personas como lo que son: cultistas de la muerte. Estos guerreros sagrados del Imperium creen que sirven al Emperador a través de la muerte. Arrebatan vidas ajenas y sacrifican la suya voluntariamente. Son maestros del asesinato, verdugos invisibles y la perdición para los traidores, los herejes y las almas caídas.{/n}

languages.text: {n}这些人是拜死教的教徒，你听说过许多关于他们的故事。他们是效忠{g|Encyclopedia:ImperiumGlossary}帝国{/g}的虔诚刺客，他们通过死亡来崇拜帝皇。他们是心怀信仰的行刑者，是阴影之中的刽子手，也是叛徒、异端分子与堕落之人的天敌。许多正义之士将他们视为信仰的拥护者，而在其他人眼中，他们举行的恐怖仪式充满了狂热与疯狂。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You have heard many stories about death cults such as this one. These devoted, holy assassins of the {g|Encyclopedia:ImperiumGlossary}Imperium{/g} have turned death into a form of worship of the Emperor. They are exemplary slayers, invisible executioners, and the scourge of traitors, heretics, and fallen souls. Many righteous people honour them as votaries of the faith, while others see their fearsome rituals as frenzied spectacles touched by madness.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}这些人是拜死教的教徒，你听说过许多关于他们的故事。他们是效忠{g|Encyclopedia:ImperiumGlossary}帝国{/g}的虔诚刺客，他们通过死亡来崇拜帝皇。他们是心怀信仰的行刑者，是阴影之中的刽子手，也是叛徒、异端分子与堕落之人的天敌。许多正义之士将他们视为信仰的拥护者，而在其他人眼中，他们举行的恐怖仪式充满了狂热与疯狂。{/n}
{n}你立刻认出了这些人的身份——他们是拜死教教徒，是帝国的神圣战士，通过死亡来服侍帝皇。他们会夺走敌人的性命，也会心甘情愿地奉上自己的性命。他们是暗杀大师，是阴影之中的刽子手，也是叛徒、异端分子与堕落之人的天敌。{/n}

languages.text: {n}このような死のカルトの話はいくつも耳にしたことがあった。{g|Encyclopedia:ImperiumGlossary}帝国{/g}の聖なるアサシンたちは、死を通じて皇帝に仕えると信じこんでいるのだ。他人の命を奪い、自らの命を犠牲にする。彼らは暗殺の達人であり、目に見えない処刑人であり、裏切り者、異端者、そして堕落した魂の災いなのだ。多くの善良な人々は彼らを信仰の奉献者として称えるが、一方で彼らの恐ろしい儀式を狂気に触れた熱狂的な見世物だと見る人々もいる。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You have heard many stories about death cults such as this one. These devoted, holy assassins of the {g|Encyclopedia:ImperiumGlossary}Imperium{/g} have turned death into a form of worship of the Emperor. They are exemplary slayers, invisible executioners, and the scourge of traitors, heretics, and fallen souls. Many righteous people honour them as votaries of the faith, while others see their fearsome rituals as frenzied spectacles touched by madness.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}このような死のカルトの話はいくつも耳にしたことがあった。{g|Encyclopedia:ImperiumGlossary}帝国{/g}の聖なるアサシンたちは、死を通じて皇帝に仕えると信じこんでいるのだ。他人の命を奪い、自らの命を犠牲にする。彼らは暗殺の達人であり、目に見えない処刑人であり、裏切り者、異端者、そして堕落した魂の災いなのだ。多くの善良な人々は彼らを信仰の奉献者として称えるが、一方で彼らの恐ろしい儀式を狂気に触れた熱狂的な見世物だと見る人々もいる。{/n}
{n}この人たちが死のカルトの信者であることはすぐに分かった。帝国の聖なる戦士たちは、死を通じて皇帝に仕えると信じこんでいるのだ。他人の命を奪い、自らの命を犠牲にする。彼らは暗殺の達人であり、目に見えない処刑人であり、裏切り者、異端者、そして堕落した魂の災いなのだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du hast bereits viele Geschichten über derartige Todeskulte gehört. Diese hingebungsvollen und heiligen Assassinen des {g|Encyclopedia:ImperiumGlossary}Imperium{/g}s haben den Tod zu einer Form der Verehrung des Imperators erhoben. Sie sind famose Mörder, unsichtbare Henker und die Geißel aller Verräter, Ketzer und gefallenen Seelen. Während sie viele rechtschaffene Menschen als Geweihte des Glaubens verehren, betrachten andere ihre grausamen Rituale als von Wahnsinn getriebene Spektakel.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You have heard many stories about death cults such as this one. These devoted, holy assassins of the {g|Encyclopedia:ImperiumGlossary}Imperium{/g} have turned death into a form of worship of the Emperor. They are exemplary slayers, invisible executioners, and the scourge of traitors, heretics, and fallen souls. Many righteous people honour them as votaries of the faith, while others see their fearsome rituals as frenzied spectacles touched by madness.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Du hast bereits viele Geschichten überderartige Todeskulte gehört. Diese hingebungsvollen und heiligen Assassinen des {g|Encyclopedia:ImperiumGlossary}Imperium{/g}s haben den Tod zu einer Form der Verehrung des Imperators erhoben. Sie sind famose Mörder, unsichtbare Henker und die Geißel aller Verräter, Ketzer und gefallenen Seelen. Während sie viele rechtschaffene Menschen als Geweihte des Glaubens verehren, betrachten andere ihre grausamen Rituale als von Wahnsinn getriebene Spektakel.{/n}

{n}Du erkennst diese Leute augenblicklich als das, was sie sind: Todeskultisten. Diese heiligen Krieger des Imperiums glauben, sie würden dem Imperator dienen — durch den Tod. Sie nehmen anderen das Leben und opfern bereitwillig ihr eigenes. Sie sind meisterhafte Assassinen, unsichtbare Henker und die Geißel von Verrätern, Ketzern und gefallenen Seelen.{/n}
